post.body: haahaaa good night Dana!
Good night Elmer! Good night everybody.
exactly. simple. profound.
hey Jonathan, love the twitter tree. please add me!
twins! you bet!
I mean, they are bad
hahaha you are bad
love the archeology article. Thank you and your elves for being sucha diverse resource.
which came first? The chicken or the egg?
gobstoppers? Is that some fancy buddhist chow?
you're such a bad girl. glad to know ya!
I think Mark got that sweater from the same box the tangle lights came in
beautiful and so hard to argue with!
sweet dreams Mark!
ah yes, i remember when my kid proclaimed that she refused to sacrifice her education to the system
too funny! did that sweater come in the same box as those tangled lights?
just sayin'
where do you come up with this stuff Guy?
Sounds delicious! I'll bring the glasses.
verbs,,,breakfast of champions!
aaaaaaahhhh, I love indulgence, to fully engage is the essence of aliveness!
you're welcome! A global wave of peace is a beautiful idea, let's make it happen!
great post on aligning action with aliveness, Here's the link http://tinyurl.com/5szwug Create Solutions not Resolutions!
especially if your sorting and labeling while pouring magic eggnog!
align your actions to your best idea of you. What will that bring?
hahaha...XOXOX
Here's to having a blessed birthday and new year, Lisi!
ooooh, get a whiff of that baby's head and pass it on! Love your twitter profile page. beautiful!
Brilliant! Hope you have the best year yet!
chocolate! My favorite! Do something special for yourself, lovely!
happy, happy, happy bithday! Blow out the candles and pass the cake!
Loving those who show no love strengthens you. You asked for inspiration. I just needed the reminder!
Thanks Rick! What are you attracting this week?
Speaking of twitter parties, who's going to DJ on new year's Eve?
blechhh...tired of winter and it's not even official yet.
talking about z-mailing on TV news, emailing in your sleep. i've been working on client project in my sleep. Woke us both up last nite!
oh no! now my photo background clashes with my twitter background! Can anyone pose a simple fix?
My reward to maintaining peace and kindness in face of obstreperous family...BFF from Tucson coming in tomorrow! woohoo! Be sure to say hi!
RT @talkingChannel Let's all make a #worldpeacewave by feeling"peace" when the first second of 2009 hits! Please RT and include the channel
Align your actions to match your best idea of yourself for the most amazing experience of living.
